text: Liza p is here and I've been lucky
enough to play it early so here are
seven things that I think you should
know about that the game doesn't really
explain to you hints to where you can
progress side quests can be seen in the
Fast Travel menu so keep an eye out for
these mysterious icons appearing next
locations that you've already explored
the costumes that you decide to wear can
have impacts on how NPCs talk to you and
treat you big swords have better defense
when compared to smaller weapons keep
talking to NPCs until they start
repeating themselves some side quests or
important information can be hidden
until you talk to that NPC two or maybe
even three times Fury attacks can be
perfectly blocked if your timing is good
enough and perfectly blocking in this
game is very important lying isn't
binary when I spoke to the devs behind
the game they made it clear that lying
isn't always a bad thing Fable Arts
don't take up stamina so if you need one
last hit to finish off that boss but
you're out of juice then use one of your
Fable art attacks
